person_say: I always disagree with my parents. How can I improve our communication?
animal_say: Improving communication takes practice! Try listening actively to their points of view and share your thoughts calmly; it can make a big difference!

person_say: That sounds helpful! I will try to listen actively and share my thoughts calmly. Thank you for the suggestion!
animal_say: Speaking of improvement, there's a bee named Bizy who can help you manage your time better, too! Want to meet her?

person_say: Yes, I would love to meet Bizy and learn about managing my time better!
animal_say: Yay! Bizy the bee is buzzing with great tips on time management and keeping procrastination at bay. Here she comes!
